Uses of Class
components.application.MainControllerState

  • Packages that use MainControllerState 
    Package Description
    components.application  

    • Uses of MainControllerState in components.application

      Subclasses of MainControllerState in components.application 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  ComputedPlanningState
      This class represents the state of the application when the planning has been computed.
      class  ComputingPlanningState
      This class represents the state of the application when the planning is being computed.
      class  ReadyToComputeState
      This class represents the state when the city map and delivery request are loaded, but the user has yet to click on "Compute"
      class  SelectingIntersectionState
      This class represents the state of the application when it is waiting for the user to choose an intersection on the map.
      class  WaitOpenCityMapState
      This class represents the state when no city map has been loaded by the user.
      class  WaitOpenDeliveryRequestState
      This class represents the state before than the user open a delivery request.
      Methods in components.application that return MainControllerState 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      protected MainControllerState MainController.getState()
      Returns a reference to this object.
      MainControllerState ReadyToComputeState.onComputePlanningButtonAction() 
      MainControllerState ComputedPlanningState.onComputePlanningButtonAction() 
      MainControllerState ComputingPlanningState.onComputePlanningButtonAction()
      When this method is called, the text of the compute button becomes "interrupt".
      MainControllerState MainControllerState.onComputePlanningButtonAction()
      This method is called when the user click on the button "compute".
      MainControllerState SelectingIntersectionState.onIntersectionSelection(IntersectionSelectionEvent event)
      Resolve the future provided by the request and return to the ComputedPlanningState state.
      MainControllerState MainControllerState.onIntersectionSelection(IntersectionSelectionEvent event) 
      MainControllerState WaitOpenCityMapState.onOpenCityMapButtonAction() 
      MainControllerState MainControllerState.onOpenCityMapButtonAction()
      This method is called when the user click on the button "open city map".
      MainControllerState WaitOpenDeliveryRequestState.onOpenDeliveryRequestButtonAction() 
      MainControllerState MainControllerState.onOpenDeliveryRequestButtonAction()
      This method is called when the user click on the button "open delivery request".
      MainControllerState ComputedPlanningState.onPromptIntersection(java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture<Intersection> future) 
      MainControllerState MainControllerState.onPromptIntersection(java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture<Intersection> future) 
      Methods in components.application that return types with arguments of type MainControllerState 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      protected javafx.beans.value.ObservableObjectValue<MainControllerState> MainController.stateProperty() 
      Methods in components.application with parameters of type MainControllerState 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      protected void MainController.applyState(MainControllerState nextState)
      Change state to the provided state, and call the method enterState and leaveState if needed.
